trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única utilizados para reconciliar as alterações efetuadas a um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> com a base de dados associada.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo foi preterido e será removido numa versão futura do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associated with the database.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>não gerar automaticamente as instruções SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações efetuadas a um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>associada com a base de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OracleCommandBuilder object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode criar um objeto de OracleCommandBuilder gera instruções SQL para atualizações de tabela única definindo a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the OracleCommandBuilder generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o OracleCommandBuilder gera quaisquer instruções SQL adicionais que não definido.

trans-unit.source: The relationship between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and its corresponding OracleCommandBuilder is always one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: A relação entre um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>e respetivos OracleCommandBuilder correspondente é sempre um para um.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To create this correspondence, you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> property of the OracleCommandBuilder object.
trans-unit.target: Para criar esta correspondência de e-mail, defina o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>propriedade do objeto OracleCommandBuilder.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: This causes the OracleCommandBuilder to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that affect the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que o OracleCommandBuilder registar-se como um serviço de escuta, o que produz o resultado de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos que afetam o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OracleCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, utiliza o OracleCommandBuilder o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para obter um conjunto de metadados necessário.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OracleCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O OracleCommandBuilder também utiliza o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>e <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciada pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, the OracleCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, o OracleCommandBuilder é desassociar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados já não são utilizados.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe associada com <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para associar a este <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"> </xref> para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém uma cadeia utilizada como o separador de catálogo para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que indica o separador de catálogo para utilização com uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object for which this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> object will generate SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual este <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> objeto irá gerar instruções SQL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto que está associado a este <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> e preenche o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>coleção de especificado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existente para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters necessita de uma chamada adicional para a base de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações do parâmetro são conhecidas seguinte com antecedência, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros ao definir explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Só pode utilizar DeriveParameters com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar DeriveParameters para preencher o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection>com instruções Transact-SQL arbitrários, como uma instrução SELECT parametrizada.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [configurar parâmetros e tipos de dados de parâmetro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> referenciar o procedimento armazenado a partir da qual as informações do parâmetro são derivada.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados para o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>coleção do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> specified was not <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto do comando não é um nome de procedimento armazenado válida, ou o <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref> especificado não era <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar eliminações na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método de GetDeleteCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetDeleteCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar as eliminações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar eliminações na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>método para resolução de problemas ou informativa fins porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como base de um comando de modificação.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se forem satisfeitas as seguintes condições: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>está especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se for VERDADEIRO, gere nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de colunas, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se for FALSO, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar as eliminações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar inserções na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método de GetInsertCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetInsertCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para efetuar inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar inserções na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>método para resolução de problemas ou informativa fins porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como base de um comando de modificação.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se forem satisfeitas as seguintes condições: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>está especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se for VERDADEIRO, gere nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de colunas, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se for FALSO, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para efetuar inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar atualizações na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método de GetUpdateCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetUpdateCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetUpdateCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se forem satisfeitas as seguintes condições: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se for VERDADEIRO, gere nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de colunas, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se for FALSO, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador unquoted no caso de catálogo correto, devolve o correto entre aspas esse identificador, incluindo corretamente escape qualquer aspas incorporadas no identificador de formato.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão delimitada por aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Incorporados aspas dentro do identificador são caráter de escape correto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o carácter a ser utilizado para o separador entre o identificador de esquema e quaisquer outros identificadores.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, os servidores de base de dados indicam o esquema para um identificador ao separar o nome do esquema do identificador com caráter de algumas.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, SQL Server utiliza o ponto e vírgula, criação de identificadores de conclusão, tais como a pessoa: NomeDoCliente, onde "Pessoa" é o nome de esquema e "NomeDoCliente" é o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade permite aos programadores alterar este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a ser utilizado como o separador de esquema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador delimitado por aspas, devolve o formato correto unquoted esse identificador, incluindo corretamente anular escaping qualquer aspas incorporadas no identificador de.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador com as aspas incorporadas removidas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted, com aspas incorporados corretamente anular com caráter de escape.
